parameters: It's like all the excess heat in my body is being drained away.
I feel like I could soak in it forever.
I still want to sleep, so I'm going to take another nap. ......
I really thought I was going to lose it, but...
I feel so much better after a dip in this spring!
I'm sure there's someone who brought me here, isn't there?
I have to say thank you, thank you!
No ningen, no fairy can get through here.
If you want to go through, go talk to the Great Fairy.
I'm sorry, but even fairies can't get through here.

It is recommended to sip the water from the springs from all over the island.
Yeah, you're the one that, uh, Liz and the others found.
You're all right now, aren't you?Ningen.
I would tell the Great Fairy right away, but...
Unfortunately, the Great Fairy is not here right now.
We're a little ways from here.
To the fairies who saved you, Rita, Liz, and Lina.
In the meantime, the Great Elf will arrive.
Hmm?Don't know which fairy to talk to?
I'm sure you can find him if you talk to him everywhere you can.
Even if I tell you, you nincompoops wouldn't be able to tell the difference.
If I had to guess, I'd say he's in a place where he can talk to you.
Well, I'm off to fetch the Great Fairy.
Wounded ningen, take your time until the wound heals.
Sorry to keep you waiting, but the Great Fairy has arrived.
I want to buy an item.
I want to buy an item.
I've prepared something like this. What do you think?
Come back when you need me.
That's what the Great Fairy says...
Rita and the other fairies will be worried.
Take your time and do only what you can do.
Sometimes things don't turn out the way you want them to.
It's always best to keep your head down.
You may use this spring at any time.
How to cross the pond?Oh yeah, you can't fly...
I'm sorry, but you'll have to look elsewhere.

You already have the Essence of the Forest, don't you?
Your part may be over, but I'll still have the items for you.
I want to buy an item.
I want to buy an item.
I've prepared something like this. What do you think?
Come back when you need me.
The Great Fairy has a bit of a penchant for it.
So a sappy guy like me.
This is how I've been following you as your aide...
Sometimes I say the most amazing things.
I've had my share of chills.
Seeing him act out his attitude like you do.
I hope the Great Fairy will be a little more action-oriented...
You're acting so unlike a great elf, you're going to break out in a cold sweat.
Maybe it's all a calculated attitude.
What can I do for you today?

You're acting so unlike a great elf, you're going to break out in a cold sweat.
Maybe it's all a calculated attitude.
I thought I was missing something, but I guess I'm not!
No, I didn't do it because I wanted to be thanked...
You were a wreck, but you didn't look too bad, and you sa...
I thought it would be fun to talk to her when she was feeling better.
Ah!Yes, I know it's hard to get home from here.
I'm Aruru. Can I come here again?
Arle!I got it!You can call me Liz.
I'll tell everyone you're a good ningen!
I know it's hard to get home from here.
A way to cross the pond?
Yeah, I don't know, something like a rope?
Maybe Rita knows more about that kind of thing.
I'm sorry I couldn't help you...
No, thank you!You've been a big help.
I hear you're collecting red ice.
I'm not much of a fighter.
If you're going to make something, leave it to us!
I know it's hard to get home from here.
Hey, Liz!I'm as healthy as ever, okay?
So you're all healed up now.
Of all the creatures that seek blessings, fairies are the easiest to connect with.
It seems that our thoughts have reached you!
You were thinking of me, weren't you?
It's not that I don't like you, it's just...
Um, you can call me Rita if you want...
I'm Aruru. Nice to meet you, Rita.
Ningen and fairies can easily communicate with each other.
How to cross the pond, huh?
Yeah, I wonder if there's, like, some kind of rope?
There's a magic rope that I was asked to develop a while ago.
Climbing by hooking onto distant objects.
You can stretch it across the pile.
It's hard to get the right ingredients...
We need five red ice that can only be obtained in the Forest of Light.
If I get it, do you think I could make it?
It's not easy for Arle to make.
The three of us can make it in no time.
I wonder if it's okay to ask the fairies for help.
Of course, I'd be happy to make one for you, Arl!
In return, please come back to the village to visit us again!
Then, I'll ask Aruru to gather the materials.
The red enemy that rarely appears in the Forest of Light.
When you've collected five, please talk to me again.
Oh, you brought it, didn't you?
Hey, let's get you and Taiming together...
That's it, that's it, that's the way it is.
The magic rope, Fairy Tazuna, can be extended and retracted at will.
It can be adjusted to any length you want, and can be used again after cutting.
If you see a suspicious place on the map, check it out!
If the place is good, we can set up a rope.
But I'm not sure how useful it is.
Use it to see for yourself.
The red enemy that rarely appears in the Forest of Light.
When you've collected five, please talk to me again.
The magic rope, Fairy Tazuna, can be extended and retracted at will.
It can be adjusted to any length you want, and can be used again after cutting.
If you see a suspicious place on the map, check it out!
If the place is good, we can set up a rope.
But I'm not sure how useful it is.
Use it to see for yourself.
If you find anything interesting, please let me know.
I'd be happy to do something with us again, so...
Rita, as usual, you have an insatiable appetite for knowledge.
It's amazing. We play in the water all the time.
I didn't know that spring had that kind of effect.
I wish I could play in that fountain every day...
Will you take me out sometime?
If you're feeling better, you're more than welcome.
I'm Rina. Nice to meet you, Aruru.
Playing in the water, it's fun!
Yeah, I don't know, something like a rope?
I'm sorry... I just prefer to get wet.
But, but!Rita knows a lot about such things.
It's not safe, so be careful, okay?
Playing in the water, it's fun!
Aruru-san, do you want to play in the water?
I'm sorry. Now is not a good time...
I didn't bring a change of clothes.
Well, if you have a change of clothes...
You're the one they're talking about.
The human who was brought in wounded, right?
I am the Great Fairy Meuniere.
He is the chief of the fairies who control the forest around here.
I'm sorry for barging in on you like this.
Oh, dear, don't worry about it, okay?
Some fairies are a little scared.
It's very normal to have many different personalities.
It's the same with humans, isn't it?
More importantly, why did he do that to me?
I'd like to know how bad the wound is, if you don't mind telling me.
I've still got things to do.
We'll have to find the carbuncle that broke off on the way...
You're a very good-natured man, aren't you?
I'm willing to sacrifice myself for the sake of others.
I never thought I'd be hurt like that as a result.
And I don't think you're lying.
You may freely enter and leave this village in the future.
Now I'll get to see Rita, Liz, and Lina again!
At the place where you are said to have fallen in an abandoned mine.
It must be fate that the power of the gate was accidentally weakened.
The truth is, if I let you leave this village...
I was going to close the gate again, so that no one could get in from the outside.
But the transference spell you use on your travels...
With our help, we can get through the gate.
I give you permission to use that magic circle.
The conditions for using the magic circle are very limited.
It's easier to gather magic, the weather is more stable...
We've been going around this village.
I've never been in a place like that...
It's a gate to prevent interference from the outside world.
He said there were traces of a magic circle that triggered the deployment.
You couldn't find it anywhere in this village, could you?
Where the magic circle could be deployed.
We're still working on that one.
It's all right. I'm a softie.
We'll let them take care of us.
Uh, this is probably just me being a pain in the ass.
In the magic circle through the gate
It is located in the back of the Forest of Light adjacent to this fairy village.
The Forest of Light is outside the gates of the fairy village.
It's part of the sacred forest passed down from our ancestors.
I'm going to get some items while I'm guarding that forest.
I'm good at walking in the woods!
Hmm. I was hoping you'd say that.
The essence of the forest required for the magic circle of transfer is
You can collect them by awakening the magic spheres in the Forest of Light.
There are also demons that disguise themselves as fairies to trick humans.
I'll have Leah, your aide, prepare the tools the humans prefer.
Please make sure you're prepared before you go.
All right, thank you, Great Fairy!
I'll have Leah, your aide, prepare the tools the humans prefer.
Please make sure you're prepared before you go.
I've brought you Essence of the Forest!
Welcome back. We've been expecting you.
Then, as promised, we will do our part...
The rain didn't hit us too badly here.
It's a great location and a popular spot for fairies.
The magic power will be supplied perfectly.
Next time, I'll bring my friends and come visit you!
Now you should be able to use it.
Now, you've been waiting for this moment, haven't you?
Please try to use it as soon as possible.
Now you can equip up to two accessories!
Now, please come and visit me, okay?
Now you're going to have to talk to me, too, okay?
They'll be waiting for you, too.
I wish you all the best on your journey. ......
Arul, welcome to the fairy village.
What can I do for you today?
I don't know if I'll need it in the future.
In the forest of light, I lit the magic ball as before.
You can get the Essence of the Forest again.
You'll need magic to activate it.
The role of the magic sphere is to gather the spirit of the surrounding forest and materialize it.
The suction is such that it does not affect the forest.
You can use it as many times as you like.
But as you can see from using it.
If that magic ball was one big object...
It takes a lot of magic to activate it.
He says the user will not be safe.
It's a tool handed down from one generation to the next.
Please take good care of it.
Ufff...... I knew you'd ask, didn't I?
It's because my past life was the same as yours.
I heard he loved it very much.
I'm not sure what kind of food that is.
I'd like to try it once.
It must be a sweet and delicious fruit.
There's a hint of a fairy in there.
They seem to be a little different from us.
It's like a guardian spirit that watches over you from the side.
I can't let him play with the other fairies.
